rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {1249, 3564, M3704}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {NUR4401, NUR4402}

unitName: Clinical honours thesis 3: Conducting a research project
description: The unit provides students with the opportunity to implement the research proposal developed in NUR4402. Students will further develop a literature review, finalise ethical approval for their research, and collect, organise and manage the data for the study. With their research supervisors, students will explore a range of issues that can arise during the research process.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
